title: Regular season home attendance of the Atlanta Falcons 2006 to 2019
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Home attendance, with a total of 14 data points. The chart has 5 significant trends.
The longest trend is moderately positive which exists from 2014 to 2010.
Also, the next significant trend is moderately positive which exists from 2019 to 2016.
Similarly, the next significant trend is extremely positive which exists from 2016 to 2014.
Similarly, the next significant trend is moderately positive which exists from 2010 to 2008.
Also, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2008 to 2006.
gold: This graph depicts the total regular season home attendance of the Atlanta Falcons franchise of the National Football League from 2006 to 2019 . In 2019 , the regular season home attendance of the franchise was 572,811 .
